mapper.select: SELECT hc.serial_number FROM Heendy_car hc WHERE hc.branch_code = #{branchCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Heendy_car_reservation hcr WHERE hc.serial_number = hcr.serial_number AND (hcr.return_yn = 'N' AND hcr.cancel_yn = 'N') ) AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION ( BRANCH_CODE, MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_TIME, CREATED_AT, SERIAL_NUMBER ) VALUES( #{branchCode}, #{memberId}, #{reservationTime}, #{createdAt}, #{serialNumber} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, BRANCH_CODE, MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_TIME, CREATED_AT, PICKUP_YN, CANCEL_YN, RETURN_YN FROM HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE ID = #{reservationId}

SELECT r.id,r.member_id,r.serial_number, m.name, m.phone_number, r.reservation_time, r.pickup_yn, r.cancel_yn, r.return_yn FROM HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION r JOIN MEMBER m ON r.member_id = m.id WHERE r.branch_code = #{branchCode} ORDER BY r.reservation_time desc

SELECT r.ID, r.RESERVATION_TIME, r.CREATED_AT, r.BRANCH_CODE, r.CANCEL_YN, b.IMG_URL AS branchImgUrl FROM HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION r JOIN BRANCH_HEENDY_CAR b ON r.BRANCH_CODE = b.BRANCH_CODE WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY r.RESERVATION_TIME desc
SELECT ID, BRANCH_CODE, MEMBER_ID, RESERVATION_TIME FROM HEENDY_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TRUNC(RESERVATION_TIME) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CANCEL_YN = 'N'
